name: Darkwave
description: Expands on the dark, introspective and sorrowful atmosphere of Gothic Rock; borrowing aspects from Electronic and other non-Rock influences.

sub_genres.name: Ethereal Wave
sub_genres.description: Atmospheric guitar and synthesizer soundscapes, effects like reverb and delay, and commonly soprano female vocals to create a surreal, otherworldly effect.

sub_genres.name: Neoclassical Darkwave
sub_genres.description: Combines dark and melancholic atmosphere with Western Classical Music.

sub_genres.name: Neue Deutsche Todeskunst
sub_genres.description: Dark themes inspired by German philosophy and poetry, typically combining Electronic instrumentation with neoclassical influences and an eccentric, theatrical style.
